entry.content:
Description

In this session, Kangwon Lee shares his journey of automating assignment grading workflows using pytest and GitHub Actions. The talk covers the motivations for automation, the technical setup process, challenges faced during implementation, and best practices for using continuous integration tools to streamline grading tasks. This session is valuable for educators and developers interested in educational automation.
